alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dodge, central Pulaski, southwestern Bleckley and south central Houston Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Browndale, or near Hawkinsville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Hawkinsville, Dubois, Browndale, Gresston, Empire, Mobley Crossing, Hartford, Pulaski State Prison, Baileys Park and Klondike. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central Georgia.
